              <p>

               <br/>

               <br/>

               </p>

              </a>

         <button aria-label="{{ctaLabel}}" class="btn-xsmall cta hero-cta" ng-bind="ctaLabel" ng-click="findRooms( $event )" ng-keypress="findRooms( $event )">
         </button>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="booking-search-form booking-search-form-small" ng-if="viewPort === 'small'">
       <div class="search-form-container">
        <div class="dropdown-container region-selector-container">
         <div class="booking-widget-dropdown-button">
          <select class="region-selector" ng-change="getRegionSelect($event,selectedRegionSmall)" ng-model="selectedRegionSmall" ng-options="item.name for item in locationDropDownList track by item.name">
          </select>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="dropdown-container resort-selector-container">
         <div class="booking-widget-dropdown-button">
          <select class="resort-selector" ng-change="getResortSelect($event,$parent.selectedResortSmall)" ng-model="$parent.selectedResortSmall" ng-options="item.name for item in locationDropDefault.subItems track by item.propertyId">
           <option ng-bind="propertyFieldValue">
           </option>
          </select>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="dropdown-container travel-date-container">
         <span class="booking-widget-dropdown-button travel-date-selector" ng-click="getDurationOffCanvas($event)">
          <span ng-bind="calendarDropdownTitle" ng-if="!calendarCheckInCheckOutLabelSmall">
          </span>
          <span ng-bind="calendarCheckInCheckOutLabelSmall" ng-if="calendarCheckInCheckOutLabelSmall">
          </span>
         </span>
         <div class="duration-dropdown s-hide m-hide l-hide" id="duration-list-small" role="listbox">
          <div class="mini-calendar clearfix mobile-view m-hide l-hide" id="bookingWidgetCalendarSmall">
           <button class="h2" ng-click="closeDurationOffCanvas()">
            <span ng-bind="selectDates">
            </span>
            <span class="btn-close">
            </span>
           </button>
           <ul class="calendarBtns">
            <li class="checkin" id="select-checkin-toggle" ng-class="{'active':firstClick}">
             <span class="lbl-date" ng-bind="calendarCheckInCopy">
             </span>
             <span ng-bind="calendarCheckInDate">
             </span>
            </li>
            <li class="checkout" id="select-checkout-toggle" ng-class="{'active':!firstClick}">
             <span class="lbl-date" ng-bind="calendarCheckOutCopy">
             </span>
             <span ng-bind="calendarCheckOutDate">
             </span>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <div class="error-message" ng-class="{ 'error-hide' : !model.errorShowing }">
            <span class="error-icon">
            </span>
            <p ng-bind-html="model.error | trust">
            </p>
            <div class="btn-error-close">
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="week names day-of-week-fixed">
            <span class="day">
             S
            </span>
            <span class="day">
             M
            </span>
            <span class="day">
             T
            </span>
            <span class="day">
             W
            </span>
            <span class="day">
             T
            </span>
            <span class="day">
             F
            </span>
            <span class="day">
             S
            </span>
           </div>
           <div class="months-wrapper" ng-class="{ 'error-show' : model.errorShowing }">
            <div class="week names s-hide">
             <span class="day">
              S
             </span>
             <span class="day">
              M
             </span>
             <span class="day">
              T
             </span>
             <span class="day">
              W
             </span>
             <span class="day">
              T
             </span>
             <span class="day">
              F
             </span>
             <span class="day">
              S
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="month month-count-{{$index}}" ng-repeat="item in model.calendar track by $index">
             <div class="header">
              <span data-filter="{{$index}}">
               {{item.year}} {{item.month}}
              </span>
             </div>
             <div class="week" ng-repeat="week in item.weeks">
              <span class="day" ng-class="{ today: day.isToday, 'different-month': !day.isCurrentMonth, 'date-wrapper': day.isCurrentMonth, selected: inSelectedMode(day), 'past':day.isPastDay }" ng-click="selectDate(day, $event, $index)" ng-repeat="day in week.days" role="button" tabindex="-1">
               {{day.number}}
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="dropdown-container guest-selector-container">
         <div class="booking-widget-dropdown-button">
          <select class="guest-selector" ng-change="getGuestSelect($event, numAdultsSmall)" ng-model="numAdultsSmall" ng-options="item.name for item in guestOptions track by item.value">
          </select>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="button-wrapper">
         <button aria-label="{{ctaLabel}}" class="btn-xsmall cta hero-cta" ng-bind="ctaLabel" ng-click="findRooms( $event )">
         </button>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
